TopicTitle: 1.0: SPH Engineer doesn't recognise jet engine alternator.

Articles.Content:
Engineer says "Electric charge required but not generated." Fig1:

[![gbshDlgl.png](http://i.imgur.com/gbshDlgl.png)](http://imgur.com/gbshDlg)

However, alternator does produce charge when engine runs. (Charge increases as engine spools up) Fig2:

[![gHDopxgl.png](http://i.imgur.com/gHDopxgl.png)](http://imgur.com/gHDopxg)

Win 32. KSP V1.0 downloaded 27/04/15
